creator: george.farnbach@ibx.com
text:
Testing out how to create needed pdf files. Downloaded fop 
xml-fop_20010410162819.tar.gz from your site. Working away. Found that fo:table 
background-color and fo:block background-color properties and fo:table-row all 
work. But the fo:table-column and fo:table-cell background-color attributes are 
inoperable. This extends to the example.fo files that came with the download.

This line from your background.fo file:
        <fo:table-cell background-color="green">
does not work and neither does this one:
        <fo:table-row background-color="green">
batch transition pre-FOP1.0 resolved+fixed bugs to closed+fixed
creator: gadams@apache.org
